text:
I’m trying to figure out the right syntax to add a local pkg to a project environment; from the output of  pkg> ?add , which says a subdirectory can be specified with path:subdir/path  in this case, I expect to be able to to something like:
```(@v1.5) pkg> add /home/user/devdir:subdir1/subdir1/pkgname```
but I get the interesting error message:
```ERROR: expected a `name` entry in project file at `/tmp/jl_SPfHz1/Project.toml````
Any ideas what I’m doing wrong?
